regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an alternative notification method if the visual or audible alert cannot be activated in the cab.

regen.absent_element: situation of continuing alerts until the call is terminated
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide continuous visual and audible alerts in the cab until the Railway emergency call is terminated.

regen.absent_element: continuation of visual and audible alert until call termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall maintain a visual and audible alert in the cab until the Railway emergency call is terminated.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
